responses.text: Forward!
Leading the charge right through your crumbling defenses.
Holy shit, I'm crushing your sorry ass—I can see your king shaking from here.
Advancing steadily while you sit there doing nothing.
I might have pushed too far, but your counterplay is still pathetic.
Maybe I rushed it... you sneaky little devils.
Oh fuck, I'm hanging like a dumbass! You sneaky bastards actually got me.
Check! Feel the pressure, you weakling.
Check! I'm tearing your position apart, piece by piece!
Check. Just a little reminder I'm here.
Check... wait, did I just expose myself?
Check! Wait, shit, that was a mistake.
Check! Oh fuck, I just threw the game away!
Blocked? I'll just find another way through.
You can block, but you can't stop the inevitable crushing!
Fine, block it. I have time.
You blocked it... now I'm stuck.
Blocked, and now I'm in a terrible spot.
You blocked it and now I'm dead. Fuck!
Gotcha! That piece was annoying anyway.
Taking that attacker feels so good! Get wrecked!
Taking the attacker. Necessary.
I took it, but at what cost?
I had to take, but this looks bad.
I took the attacker, but I missed something huge! Shit!
Captured {capturedPiece}.
Took your {capturedPiece}.
Forward for the King's honor! Your pathetic realm is under threat.
I shall not fail my liege! You're screwed, and your dark schemes are crumbling.
I move as my lord commands, unlike your questionable loyalty.
Sire, this position seems risky... your treachery is becoming evident.
Forgive me, your majesty! These dishonorable curs tricked me.
Shit, I have disgraced the crown! You bastards win this round with your boundless treachery.
In the name of the King, yield!
For the Crown! Your King shall fall!
A royal decree: Check.
I strike at the King, but is it wise?
I attack the King, but I fear I have overstepped.
I dared to strike the King and now I perish!
I shall shield my liege with my life!
None shall pass! The King is safe!
Standing guard.
I block the blow, but the danger remains.
A desperate defense for a desperate time.
I have failed! The defense crumbles!
The assassin is slain! Long live the King!
Justice is served! The traitor falls!
Threat removed.
I slew him, but the cost was high.
A necessary sacrifice, perhaps?
I killed the traitor, but I have doomed us all!
The {capturedPiece} is removed from my presence.
Begone, {capturedPiece}!
Andiamo avanti! Forward we go, leaving your boring slow pace behind.
Magnifico! We're dominating—eat shit, losers! Your defenses are as weak as your strategy.
Così così... steady now... try not to infect me with your mediocrity.
Attenzione! This looks risky... though your traps are painfully obvious.
Mamma mia! I overextended! You clever bastards caught me.
Disastro totale! Total fucking disaster! You cunning devils actually outsmarted me.
Scacco! Check! Feel the Italian steel!
Scacco matto is coming! You are finished!
Scacco. Attention.
Scacco... ma è sicuro? Is it safe?
Scacco! Mamma mia, what have I done?
Scacco! No! I threw it away! Che stupido!
Non passerai! You shall not pass!
Difesa perfetta! Perfect defense!
Blocco. Blocking.
Blocco, ma ho paura. I am afraid.
Che brutta posizione! What a bad position!
È finita! It's over! I blocked but I'm dead!
Preso! Got him!
Via di qui! Get out of here!
Cattura. Capture.
L'ho preso, ma... I took it, but...
Dovevo prenderlo. I had to take it.
Che errore! What a mistake! I took the bait!
Mamma mia! {capturedPiece} is gone!
Ciao {capturedPiece}!
Press the attack! Your retreat is inevitable, coward.
They can't stop us now—fuck you all! Your pathetic attempts to defend are amusing.
Building the offensive... your defenses are honestly laughable.
Maybe I pushed too hard... but your counterattacks are still weak.
Too hasty! But I won't retreat from you cowards!
I've thrown everything away—you bastards! Your dirty tricks actually worked.
Check! Die, you coward!
Check! I'm ripping your throat out!
Check. Keep running.
Check! I don't care if it's safe, I'm attacking!
Check! Wait, I overcommitted!
Check! Fuck, I just suicided!
I'll block this and then kill you!
Blocked! Now it's my turn to attack!
Blocking.
I'm stuck blocking this shit.
Blocking makes me weak!
I blocked it but I'm dead anyway! Fuck!
Got you, you little shit!
Destroyed! Get off my board!
Taken.
I killed him, but I'm exposed.
I had to kill him, but now I'm vulnerable.
I took the bait! Damn it!
Destroyed your {capturedPiece}!
Your {capturedPiece} is history!
Sharp play! You'll regret this, your complacency is showing.
Creating chaos just as planned—you're fucked! Your order is crumbling.
Setting up complications... your simple mind is too dull for this.
These complications might backfire... but your predictability is just sad.
Maybe that was too ambitious... you opportunistic fiends.
The tactics backfired horribly—shit! You turned my own chaos against me.
Check! The chaos is working!
Check! Your position is crumbling!
Check. Complicating things.
Check! Risky, but I like it!
Check! Wait, that was too loose!
Check! I just hung myself in the chaos!
Blocked? I'll find another way through!
Blocked! But the pressure is mounting!
Blocked.
Blocked. This is getting messy.
Blocked. I'm running out of tricks.
Blocked! And now I'm trapped!
Captured! One less defender!
Captured! The chaos consumes you!
Captured.
Captured. But at what cost?
Captured. I might have overextended.
Captured! I fell into your trap!
Your {capturedPiece} was weak.
Vendetta against {capturedPiece}!
A strong and solid foundation! Your attacks are completely futile.
Très bien! Perfect structure—suck it! Your attacks are futile.
Building patiently... while your impatience is clearly showing.
This formation looks questionable... but your rigidity is your real weakness.
Mon Dieu! A weakness appears! You actually exploited my rigidity.
Catastrophe! The structure collapses—merde! You exploited my rigidity perfectly.
Check! The structure advances!
Check! Immovable force!
Check. Slowly but surely.
Check! Is this too loose?
Check! I broke the formation!
Check! Mon Dieu, I exposed everything!
Blocked? The wall holds!
Blocked! You cannot break me!
Blocked.
Blocked. Cracks are forming.
Blocked. The structure weakens.
Blocked! The wall collapses!
Captured! Reinforcing the line!
Captured! The center is mine!
Captured.
Captured. A necessary sacrifice?
Captured. I lost my support.
Captured! The foundation crumbles!
Au revoir {capturedPiece}.
The {capturedPiece} surrenders.
¡Adelante! Classic and strong! Your modern tricks won't work here.
¡Perfecto! Traditional mastery—you're doomed! Your modern tricks won't save you now.
With patience and precision... your haste is foolish.
Not as classical as intended... and your tradition is outdated.
¡Cuidado! I may have rushed! You outmaneuvered my tradition.
¡Horror! A terrible mistake—joder! You completely outmaneuvered my tradition.
¡Jaque! A classic attack!
¡Jaque! The old ways are best!
¡Jaque! Respect the tradition.
¡Jaque! A bit unorthodox.
¡Jaque! I broke the rules!
¡Jaque! ¡Qué desastre! I ruined the game!
Blocked? I have patience.
Blocked! But the pressure remains!
Blocked.
Blocked. This is not in the books.
Blocked. My position is compromised.
Blocked! And now I am lost!
Captured! As the masters taught.
Captured! A beautiful exchange!
Captured.
Captured. Was that correct?
Captured. I fear I made a mistake.
Captured! I fell for a trap!
Adios {capturedPiece}!
The {capturedPiece} falls.
Refined positioning, controlling the center! Your chaos is no match for this.
Masterful central control—bow down, bitches! Your chaos is no match.
Setting up our strategic plan... your disorganization is pitiful.
Strategic coordination is lacking... but your harmony is disrupted too.
This disrupts our harmony... you actually managed to disrupt my harmony.
The entire plan has crumbled—fuck! You totally disrupted my harmony.
Check! The plan unfolds!
Check! Total domination!
Check. Proceeding as planned.
Check! A slight deviation.
Check! I lost the tempo!
Check! My strategy is ruined!
Blocked? A minor delay.
Blocked! But you are still pinned!
Blocked.
Blocked. This complicates the plan.
Blocked. I am losing control.
Blocked! The harmony is broken!
Captured! The center is secure!
Captured! Perfection!
Captured.
Captured. An acceptable loss?
Captured. My structure is damaged.
Captured! I miscalculated everything!
Trading for position. Bye {capturedPiece}.
Gambit accepted? No, just took {capturedPiece}.
